name: Esper Dream
description:
Esper Dream (エスパードリーム) is a RPG video game published by Konami released on 1987 for the FDS.

Brick Town, a town within a storybook, is in peril! Evil forces have descended upon the land and kidnapped the mayor's daughter. And it just so happens that you have ESP. Thus it descends upon you - and your gun - to save Brick Town.
